passed.title: Section 1: JSON Schema Validation 1.1 Field Metadata [1.1.1] Every field should have a title attribute
passed.rationale: Field titles are displayed as labels in the UI. Missing titles show raw field names which confuses users.
passed.suggestedFix: Add `title = "Human Readable Name"` to the @ModuleConfigField annotation.

passed.title: Section 1: JSON Schema Validation 1.1 Field Metadata [1.1.2] Every field should have a description attribute
passed.rationale: Descriptions provide help text below form fields. Missing descriptions leave users guessing.
passed.suggestedFix: Add `description = "Explain what this field does"` to @ModuleConfigField.

passed.title: Section 1: JSON Schema Validation 1.1 Field Metadata [1.1.3] Titles should use Title Case (not camelCase)
passed.rationale: camelCase titles look like programmer variable names. Title Case is more professional.
passed.suggestedFix: Change title from "connectionTimeout" to "Connection Timeout".

passed.title: Section 1: JSON Schema Validation 1.1 Field Metadata [1.1.5] Descriptions should not end with question marks
passed.rationale: Descriptions should be statements, not questions.
passed.suggestedFix: Change "Enable TLS?" to "Enable TLS encryption for secure connections".

passed.title: Section 1: JSON Schema Validation 1.2 Type Constraints [1.2.1] Integer fields should use numberMin/numberMax (not string constraints)
passed.rationale: Using string constraints on integer fields causes validation to fail silently.
passed.suggestedFix: Use `numberMin` and `numberMax` instead of string constraints for integers.

passed.title: Section 1: JSON Schema Validation 1.2 Type Constraints [1.2.2] String fields should use stringMinLength/stringMaxLength (not number constraints)
passed.rationale: Using number constraints on string fields is semantically incorrect.
passed.suggestedFix: Use `stringMinLength` and `stringMaxLength` for string fields.

passed.title: Section 1: JSON Schema Validation 1.2 Type Constraints [1.2.3] Port fields should have valid port range (1-65535)
passed.rationale: Ports must be between 1 and 65535. Missing bounds allow invalid configurations.
passed.suggestedFix: Add `numberMin = 1` and `numberMax = 65535` to port field annotations.

passed.title: Section 1: JSON Schema Validation 1.2 Type Constraints [1.2.5] String pattern (regex) should be valid
passed.rationale: Invalid regex patterns cause runtime errors and prevent form validation.
passed.suggestedFix: Test your regex pattern before adding to annotation.

passed.title: Section 1: JSON Schema Validation 1.3 Required Fields [1.3.1] Required array should only contain existing properties
passed.rationale: Referencing non-existent fields in required array causes schema validation errors.
passed.suggestedFix: Ensure all field names in required match actual field names.

passed.title: Section 1: JSON Schema Validation 1.3 Required Fields [1.3.3] Optional fields should have default values
Section 1: JSON Schema Validation 1.4 Enum Fields [1.4.1] enumDisplayValues count should match enum values count
passed.rationale: Mismatched counts cause rendering issues with some options showing raw enum values.
passed.suggestedFix: Ensure enumDisplayValues array has exactly the same count as the enum.

passed.title: Section 1: JSON Schema Validation 1.5 Format Types [1.5.3] ID fields should use identifier format
passed.rationale: The identifier format validates IDs only contain allowed characters.
passed.suggestedFix: Add `format = FieldType.IDENTIFIER` to the id field annotation.

passed.title: Section 1: JSON Schema Validation 1.5 Format Types [1.5.4] MQTT topic fields should use mqtt-topic format
Section 2: UI Schema Validation 2.1 Structure [2.1.1] UI Schema should exist
passed.rationale: Without UI Schema, forms use default layout which may not be logical.
passed.suggestedFix: Create a UI Schema JSON file and implement getUiSchema().

passed.title: Section 2: UI Schema Validation 2.1 Structure [2.1.2] ui:tabs should group related fields
passed.rationale: Tabs organize complex forms into logical sections, improving UX.
passed.suggestedFix: Add ui:tabs array to group related fields.

passed.title: Section 2: UI Schema Validation 2.1 Structure [2.1.3] ui:order should define logical field sequence
passed.rationale: Without ui:order, fields appear in schema order which may not be logical.
passed.suggestedFix: Add ui:order array with fields in logical sequence.

passed.title: Section 2: UI Schema Validation 2.1 Structure [2.1.4] Tab names should be clear and descriptive
passed.rationale: Generic tab names like "Tab 1" do not help users understand the form structure.
passed.suggestedFix: Use descriptive names like "Connection Settings", "Authentication".

passed.title: Section 2: UI Schema Validation 2.1 Structure Tab properties should reference existing schema fields
Section 2: UI Schema Validation 2.2 Widgets [2.2.1] Port fields should use updown widget
passed.rationale: The updown widget provides increment/decrement buttons for numeric input.
passed.suggestedFix: Add `"port": { "ui:widget": "updown" }` to your UI Schema.

passed.title: Section 2: UI Schema Validation 2.2 Widgets [2.2.2] Password fields should use password widget
passed.rationale: Password fields must mask input to prevent shoulder surfing.
passed.suggestedFix: Add `"password": { "ui:widget": "password" }` to your UI Schema.

passed.title: Section 2: UI Schema Validation 2.3 Field Behavior [2.3.1] id field should NOT have hardcoded ui:disabled
passed.rationale: The id field should be editable in create mode but disabled in edit mode.
passed.suggestedFix: Remove `"ui:disabled": true` from id field.

passed.title: Section 2: UI Schema Validation 2.4 Arrays and Objects [2.4.3] Collapsible array items should have titleKey
UI Schema - Form Rendering Tabs should render when ui:tabs is configured
UI Schema - Form Rendering Tab titles should match ui:tabs configuration
UI Schema - Form Rendering Clicking tabs should switch content
Section 6: Visual Testing 6.1 Form Rendering [6.1.1] Form should render without JavaScript errors
passed.rationale: JavaScript errors prevent the form from rendering correctly.
passed.suggestedFix: Check browser console for errors. Common causes: invalid JSON Schema.

passed.title: Section 6: Visual Testing 6.1 Form Rendering [6.1.2] All fields from JSON Schema should appear in form
passed.rationale: Missing fields prevent users from configuring required options.
passed.suggestedFix: Verify all @ModuleConfigField annotations have @JsonProperty.

passed.title: Section 6: Visual Testing 6.1 Form Rendering [6.1.3] Fields should render with correct labels
Section 6: Visual Testing 6.1 Form Rendering Form should display correctly in viewport
Section 6: Visual Testing 6.2 Validation [6.2.1] Required fields should show validation error when empty
passed.rationale: Users need feedback when required fields are empty.
passed.suggestedFix: Ensure fields have `required = true` in @ModuleConfigField.

passed.title: Section 6: Visual Testing 6.2 Validation [6.2.3] Number bounds should be validated
Section 6: Visual Testing 6.2 Validation Pattern validation should work for fields with regex
Section 6: Visual Testing 6.3 Accessibility [6.3.2] All inputs should have associated labels
passed.rationale: Screen readers need labels to announce form fields.
passed.suggestedFix: Ensure all fields have title attribute in @ModuleConfigField.

passed.title: Section 6: Visual Testing 6.3 Accessibility [6.3.3] Form should be navigable by keyboard
passed.rationale: Users who cannot use a mouse need to navigate forms with keyboard.
passed.suggestedFix: Check for custom widgets that may break tab order.

passed.title: Section 6: Visual Testing 6.3 Accessibility Submit button should be focusable and activatable
Form Interaction Form values should update on input
Form Interaction Form should handle rapid input changes
Form Interaction Form submission with valid data should succeed
